query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,COUNT(A.PJT) AS MEQ FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN B.CS157_CAB ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN B.CS157_CHB ELSE A.BSU END BSU ,A.BMT ,A.MDT ,A.FSD ,A.USD ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.BMT,1,6) = SUBSTR(A.MDT,1,6) THEN HEX(DATE(INSERT(INSERT(A.BMT,5,0,'-'),8,0,'-')) - 1 MONTHS) WHEN SUBSTR(A.BMT,1,6) = SUBSTR(A.FSD,1,6) THEN HEX(DATE(INSERT(INSERT(A.BMT,5,0,'-'),8,0,'-')) - 1 MONTHS) WHEN SUBSTR(A.BMT,1,6) = SUBSTR(A.USD,1,6) THEN HEX(DATE(INSERT(INSERT(A.BMT,5,0,'-'),8,0,'-')) - 1 MONTHS) ELSE BMT END GMON FROM (
SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,VALUE(CASE WHEN MAX(A.BCD) > '' AND SUBSTR(MAX(A.BCD),1,6) > SUBSTR(MAX(A.BMT),1,6) THEN HEX(DATE(INSERT(INSERT(MAX(A.BCD),5,0,'-'),8,0,'-')) - 1 MONTHS) ELSE MAX(A.BMT) END,'00000000') BMT ,VALUE(CASE WHEN MAX(B.ADT) > MAX(B.USD) THEN MAX(B.ADT) ELSE MAX(B.USD) END,'00000000') USD ,VALUE(MAX(C.FSD),'00000000') FSD ,VALUE(MAX(D.MDT),'00000000') MDT ,MAX(A.ARA) ARA ,MAX(A.BSU) BSU ,MIN(F.CS157_IKD) IKD
FROM ( SELECT A.CS116_PJT PJT, A.CS116_HNO HNO, MAX(A.CS116_ARA) ARA, MAX(A.CS116_BSU) BSU, MAX(A.CS116_BMT) BMT, MAX(A.CS116_BCD) BCD, MAX(A.CS116_BST) BST FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 X ON A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.CS116_PJT = X.CS116_PJT AND A.CS116_HNO = X.CS116_HNO AND X.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND X.CS116_GND = 'B' AND X.CS116_BST <= #GDATE# AND X.CS116_BCD <= #GDATE# AND A.CS116_BMT < X.CS116_BMT WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS116_GND = 'B' AND A.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS116_BST <= #GDATE# AND A.CS116_BCD <= #GDATE# AND SUBSTR(A.CS116_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND X.CS116_PJT IS NULL AND (A.CS116_BMT BETWEEN SUBSTR(#BYEAR# ,1,4)||'1201' AND #GDATE# OR A.CS116_BCD BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,4)||'0101' AND #GDATE#)
GROUP BY A.CS116_PJT, A.CS116_HNO
UNION ALL
SELECT CS101_PJT PJT ,CS101_HNO HNO ,CS101_ARA ARA ,CS101_BSU BSU ,CS101_ISD BMT ,'00000001' BCD ,'00000001' BST
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS101_PJT = B.POSID AND A.CS101_PJT||A.CS101_HNO = B.POSID_1
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS101_PJT = C.CS116_PJT AND A.CS101_HNO = C.CS116_HNO AND C.CS116_PST = 'A6'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS101_ISD BETWEEN SUBSTR(#BYEAR# ,1,4)||'1201' AND #BDATE# AND A.CS101_PST = 'A6' AND SUBSTR(A.CS101_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND CS101_PJT NOT LIKE 'M%' AND A.MDATE <= #GDATE# AND ZMUSAOCNT = '00' AND ZMUSAOCNT2 = '00' AND C.CS116_PJT IS NULL
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT, CS126_HNO HNO, MIN(CS126_USD) USD, MIN(CS126_ADT) ADT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_GKD = '1' AND CS126_GND = 'D' AND CS126_USD >= SUBSTR(#BYEAR# ,1,4)||'1201' GROUP BY CS126_PJT, CS126_HNO ) B ON A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.CS144_PJT PJT, A.CS144_HNO HNO, MAX(B.CS143_FSD) FSD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST143 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.CS143_FSD BETWEEN SUBSTR(#BYEAR# ,1,4)||'1201' AND #GDATE# AND B.CS143_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS143_SEL = 'A' AND SUBSTR(A.CS144_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') GROUP BY A.CS144_PJT, A.CS144_HNO ) C ON A.PJT = C.PJT AND A.HNO = C.HNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_PJO PJT ,CS172_HNO HNO ,MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS172_MDT BETWEEN SUBSTR(#BYEAR# ,1,4)||'1201' AND #GDATE# AND SUBSTR(CS172_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') GROUP BY CS172_PJO,CS172_HNO ) D ON A.PJT = D.PJT AND A.HNO = D.HNO
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 E ON #G_MANDT# = E.MANDT AND A.PJT = E.PJT AND A.HNO = E.HNO AND EXC = ''
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 F ON F.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = F.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = F.CS157_HNO AND F.CS157_IKD > #GDATE#
GROUP BY A.PJT, A.HNO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND A.IKD = B.CS157_IKD
) AS A WHERE A.GMON BETWEEN SUBSTR(#BYEAR# ,1,4)||'1201' AND #BDATE# GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET MEQ = B.MEQ
